thread.title: Watch: VROMANCE Shares Look At Emotional “I’m Fine” MV With Teaser Video
thread.title_full: Watch: VROMANCE Shares Look At Emotional “I’m Fine” MV With Teaser Video

author: ilmare42
title: Watch: VROMANCE Shares Look At Emotional “I’m Fine” MV With Teaser Video
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Four-member vocal group VROMANCE is taking things slow with a ballad for their next release! 
On January 4 at midnight KST, the rookie group shared a teaser video for their upcoming ballad “I’m Fine.” The music video seems like it will definitely be a tearjerker, and the guys look melancholy (but cozy) in white sweaters, as well as stylish in suits for a group shot at the end. 
Watch the teaser video here ! 
VROMANCE is housed under RBW Entertainment, the same label as the hit girl group MAMAMOO. They made their debut in the summer of last year with their groovy upbeat track “She.” 
Their upcoming release “Romance” featuring the title track “I’m Fine” will be coming out on January 6 at midnight KST. While we wait, you can check out teaser photos for their comeback here !
